<a id="ProgressBar"></a>

# ProgressBar

**Inherits:** [Range](Range.md) **\<** [Control](Control.md) **\<** [CanvasItem](CanvasItem.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A control used for visual representation of a percentage.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

A control used for visual representation of a percentage. Shows the fill percentage in the center. Can also be used to show indeterminate progress. For more fill modes, use [TextureProgressBar](TextureProgressBar.md) instead.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Enumerations

<a id="enum_ProgressBar_FillMode"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **FillMode**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_ProgressBar_FillMode)

<a id="ProgressBar_constant_FILL_BEGIN_TO_END"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[FillMode](ProgressBar.md#enum_ProgressBar_FillMode) **FILL_BEGIN_TO_END** = `0`

The progress bar fills from begin to end horizontally, according to the language direction. If [Control.is_layout_rtl()](Control.md#Control_method_is_layout_rtl) returns ``false``, it fills from left to right, and if it returns ``true``, it fills from right to left.<a id="ProgressBar_constant_FILL_END_TO_BEGIN"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[FillMode](ProgressBar.md#enum_ProgressBar_FillMode) **FILL_END_TO_BEGIN** = `1`

The progress bar fills from end to begin horizontally, according to the language direction. If [Control.is_layout_rtl()](Control.md#Control_method_is_layout_rtl) returns ``false``, it fills from right to left, and if it returns ``true``, it fills from left to right.<a id="ProgressBar_constant_FILL_TOP_TO_BOTTOM"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[FillMode](ProgressBar.md#enum_ProgressBar_FillMode) **FILL_TOP_TO_BOTTOM** = `2`

The progress fills from top to bottom.<a id="ProgressBar_constant_FILL_BOTTOM_TO_TOP"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[FillMode](ProgressBar.md#enum_ProgressBar_FillMode) **FILL_BOTTOM_TO_TOP** = `3`

The progress fills from bottom to top.<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="ProgressBar_property_editor_preview_indeterminate"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **editor_preview_indeterminate** [ðŸ”—](#ProgressBar_property_editor_preview_indeterminate)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_editor_preview_indeterminate**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_editor_preview_indeterminate_enabled**\ (\ )

If ``false``, the [indeterminate](ProgressBar.md#ProgressBar_property_indeterminate) animation will be paused in the editor.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ProgressBar_property_fill_mode"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **fill_mode** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#ProgressBar_property_fill_mode)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_fill_mode**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_fill_mode**\ (\ )

The fill direction. See [FillMode](ProgressBar.md#enum_ProgressBar_FillMode) for possible values.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ProgressBar_property_indeterminate"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **indeterminate** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#ProgressBar_property_indeterminate)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_indeterminate**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_indeterminate**\ (\ )

When set to ``true``, the progress bar indicates that something is happening with an animation, but does not show the fill percentage or value.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ProgressBar_property_show_percentage"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **show_percentage** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#ProgressBar_property_show_percentage)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_show_percentage**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_percentage_shown**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the fill percentage is displayed on the bar.

<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Theme Property Descriptions

<a id="ProgressBar_theme_color_font_color"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Color](Color.md) **font_color** = `Color(0.95, 0.95, 0.95, 1)` [ðŸ”—](#ProgressBar_theme_color_font_color)

The color of the text.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ProgressBar_theme_color_font_outline_color"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Color](Color.md) **font_outline_color** = `Color(0, 0, 0, 1)` [ðŸ”—](#ProgressBar_theme_color_font_outline_color)

The tint of text outline of the **ProgressBar**.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ProgressBar_theme_constant_outline_size"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[int](int.md) **outline_size** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#ProgressBar_theme_constant_outline_size)

The size of the text outline.

\ **Note:** If using a font with [FontFile.multichannel_signed_distance_field](FontFile.md#FontFile_property_multichannel_signed_distance_field) enabled, its [FontFile.msdf_pixel_range](FontFile.md#FontFile_property_msdf_pixel_range) must be set to at least *twice* the value of [outline_size](ProgressBar.md#ProgressBar_theme_constant_outline_size) for outline rendering to look correct. Otherwise, the outline may appear to be cut off earlier than intended.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ProgressBar_theme_font_font"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Font](Font.md) **font** [ðŸ”—](#ProgressBar_theme_font_font)

Font used to draw the fill percentage if [show_percentage](ProgressBar.md#ProgressBar_property_show_percentage) is ``true``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ProgressBar_theme_font_size_font_size"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[int](int.md) **font_size** [ðŸ”—](#ProgressBar_theme_font_size_font_size)

Font size used to draw the fill percentage if [show_percentage](ProgressBar.md#ProgressBar_property_show_percentage) is ``true``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ProgressBar_theme_style_background"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[StyleBox](StyleBox.md) **background** [ðŸ”—](#ProgressBar_theme_style_background)

The style of the background.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ProgressBar_theme_style_fill"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[StyleBox](StyleBox.md) **fill** [ðŸ”—](#ProgressBar_theme_style_fill)

The style of the progress (i.e. the part that fills the bar).
